类 UserResource

java.lang.Object
com.sismics.docs.rest.resource.BaseResource
com.sismics.docs.rest.resource.UserResource
@Path("/user") public class UserResource extends BaseResource
User REST resources.

jtremeaux

  • 方法详细资料

    • register

      @PUT public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response register(@FormParam("username") String username, @FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("email") String email, @FormParam("storage_quota") String storageQuotaStr)
      Creates a new user.
      参数:
      username - User's username
      password - Password
      email - E-Mail
      返回:
      Response

    • update

      @POST public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response update(@FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("email") String email)
      Updates the current user informations.
      参数:
      password - Password
      email - E-Mail
      返回:
      Response

    • update

      @POST @Path("{username: [a-zA-Z0-9_@.-]+}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response update(@PathParam("username") String username, @FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("email") String email, @FormParam("storage_quota") String storageQuotaStr, @FormParam("disabled") Boolean disabled)
      Updates a user informations.
      参数:
      username - Username
      password - Password
      email - E-Mail
      返回:
      Response

    • login

      @POST @Path("login") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response login(@FormParam("username") String username, @FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("code") String validationCodeStr, @FormParam("remember") boolean longLasted)
      This resource is used to authenticate the user and create a user session. The "session" is only used to identify the user, no other data is stored in the session.
      参数:
      username - Username
      password - Password
      longLasted - Remember the user next time, create a long lasted session.
      返回:
      Response

    • logout

      @POST @Path("logout") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response logout()
      Logs out the user and deletes the active session.
      返回:
      Response

    • delete

      @DELETE public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response delete()
      Deletes the current user.
      返回:
      Response

    • delete

      @DELETE @Path("{username: [a-zA-Z0-9_@.-]+}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response delete(@PathParam("username") String username)
      Deletes a user.
      参数:
      username - Username
      返回:
      Response

    • disableTotpUsername

      @POST @Path("{username: [a-zA-Z0-9_@.-]+}/disable_totp") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response disableTotpUsername(@PathParam("username") String username)
      Disable time-based one-time password for a specific user.
      参数:
      username - Username
      返回:
      Response

      Returns the information about a user.
      参数:
      username - Username
      返回:
      Response

    • list

      @GET @Path("list") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response list(@QueryParam("sort_column") Integer sortColumn, @QueryParam("asc") Boolean asc, @QueryParam("group") String groupName)
      Returns all active users.
      参数:
      sortColumn - Sort index
      asc - If true, ascending sorting, else descending
      groupName - Only return users from this group
      返回:
      Response

    • session

      @GET @Path("session") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response session()
      Returns all active sessions.
      返回:
      Response

      @DELETE @Path("session") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response deleteSession()

      返回:
      Response

      @POST @Path("onboarded") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response onboarded()

      返回:

      返回:
      Response

      @POST @Path("test_totp") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response testTotp(@FormParam("code") String validationCodeStr)
      Test time-based one-time password.
      返回:
      Response

    • disableTotp

      @POST @Path("disable_totp") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response disableTotp(@FormParam("password") String password)
      Disable time-based one-time password for the current user.
      参数:
      password - Password
      返回:
      Response

    • passwordLost

      @POST @Path("password_lost") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response passwordLost(@FormParam("username") String username)
      Create a key to reset a password and send it by email.
      参数:
      username - Username
      返回:
      Response

    • passwordReset

      @POST @Path("password_reset") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response passwordReset(@FormParam("key") String passwordResetKey, @FormParam("password") String password)
      Reset the user's password.
      参数:
      passwordResetKey - Password reset key
      password - New password
      返回:
      Response
